actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide financial assistance to medical facilities for treatment of certain aliens.

summary.text: Amends title III of the Public Health Service Act (General Powers and Duties of Public Health Service) to allow a medical facility which provides emergency medical treatment to any alien who is unlawfully in the United States and who is not eligible for any other public assistance, to receive reimbursement for the value of such treatment upon the approval of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide financial assistance to medical facilities for treatment of certain aliens.
